title: Compiling examples/tokens/ERC721.vy with userdoc format throws NatSpecSyntaxException
body:
### Version Information

* vyper Version (output of `vyper --version`): 0.2.4
* OS: linux
* Python Version (output of `python --version`): 3.8.2
* Environment (output of `pip freeze`):
asttokens==2.0.3
attrs==20.2.0
base58==2.0.1
bitarray==1.2.2
black-mamba==0.5.2
blake2b-py==0.1.3

toolz==0.11.1

typed-ast==1.4.1

urllib3==1.25.10
varint==1.0.2
vyper==0.2.4
web3==5.12.1
websockets==8.1

### What's your issue about?

```
$ vyper  -f userdoc examples/tokens/ERC721.vy 
Error compiling: examples/tokens/ERC721.vy
vyper.exceptions.NatSpecSyntaxException: Method has no parameter '_isApproved'
  line 315:5 
       314     @param _operator Address to add to the set of authorized operators.
  ---> 315     @param _isApproved True if the operators is approved, false to revoke approval.
  --------------^
       316     """
```


### How can it be fixed?

https://github.com/vyperlang/vyper/pull/2167
